Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the sign at Roosevelt Middle School in Oakland, California never displayed the message mentioned in the claim.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of lies made by President Donald Trump by stating it as his "10,000th lie."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a doctored photo from an online generator and not on any actual evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the sign shown in the photo is genuine and represents the views of the school, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation for the doctored photo is provided, stating that similar pictures from the online generator have been circulating online with various messages, none of which were actually posted outside of the school.
